Desc.entry: Korfball club. Mixed-sex team sport. Participates in regular competitive matches and in nationwide tournaments. All ages and ability welcome, no experience necessary. Holds frequent social gatherings and an annual club awards ceremony.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 7.30-9.30pm (Sep-Apr), outdoor training in summer according to demand. Matches are usually held at weekends, please contact for details
